tablab 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Tabulate a dataframe's variables' value counts

    tab_cts.Rd

    Tabulate a dataframe's variables' value counts

    tab_cts(df, id = "id", include_ids = FALSE)

    Arguments

    df

    Dataframe

    id

    Character string of the id variable

    include_ids

    Logical denoting whether a list column ids should be included in the results. The ids in each list show at which values of id the variable var contains the value val.

    Value

    Dataframe consisting of columns var, val & n

    containing a tabulation of the counts of variables' values.

    Examples

    df <-
  tibble::tibble(
    fbnr = 1:10,
    sex = haven::labelled(c(2, 1, 2, 1, 1, 2, 2, 1, 2, 1),
                          label = "sex",
                          labels = c(MALES = 1, FEMALES = 2)),
    age = c(24, 23, 23, 41, 23, 39, 30, 18, 31, 48),
    marital = haven::labelled(
      c(1, 7, 2, 6, 4, 5, 3, 8, 4, 2),
      label = "marital status",
      labels = c(
        "single" = 1,
        "steady relationship" = 2,
        "living with partner" = 3,
        "married first time" = 4,
        "remarried" = 5,
        "separated" = 6,
        "divorced" = 7,
        "widowed" = 8
      )
    )
  )
tab_cts(df, "fbnr")
#> # A tibble: 18 × 4
#>    var        nv cv        n
#>    <chr>   <int> <chr> <int>
#>  1 sex         1 NA        5
#>  2 sex         2 NA        5
#>  3 age        18 NA        1
#>  4 age        23 NA        3
#>  5 age        24 NA        1
#>  6 age        30 NA        1
#>  7 age        31 NA        1
#>  8 age        39 NA        1
#>  9 age        41 NA        1
#> 10 age        48 NA        1
#> 11 marital     1 NA        1
#> 12 marital     2 NA        2
#> 13 marital     3 NA        1
#> 14 marital     4 NA        2
#> 15 marital     5 NA        1
#> 16 marital     6 NA        1
#> 17 marital     7 NA        1
#> 18 marital     8 NA        1
